name: bron
text: Archie got ladies.

name: spectre
text: Ladies FIGHT over Archie . . . all catty and scheming and hella looking for an advantage over each other in their bikinis . . . ladies all want the redhead Archie. Is Archie-hair man in the bathroom now red of hair and freckled to go with his 'do?

name: dans
text: I never got why they all adored Archie but ignored that Jughead fellow. I hear he's quite the dish.

name: abe
text: This makes me think of.. Archie/Punisher crossover.

name: ttagxamm
text: Oh hell yes!  The strip was only a four till this comment.

name: mortshire
text: betty or veronica?

name: efurman
text: A comment left by efurman was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by ShemmJacc, heccibiggs, howl)

name: zapatos
text: Why settle for a compromise?  Three way.

name: rowboat
text: That's Zapatos!

name: ambala
text: I never realized Archie looked like a bear before.

name: f1shst1ck
text: He even got the little crosshatching on the side of his head

name: juancarlos
text: Word up! definitively a five.

name: greymantledwolf
text: the only achewood comic to date that made me feel disturbed

name: sumisueme
text: I am vastly impressed that Teodor can create freckles and eyebrows using only a bottle of mousse. Truly, he is "The MacGyver of Bears (who want to look like Archie.)"

name: paco
text: Fuck that is horrible that is more scarring than Phillipe when he cut his own hair fuck

name: d-pad
text: Lyle comes off as genuinely interested in the going ons of his housemates, which is strikingly uncharacteristic of him. I am unsure how this makes me feel.

name: bixschmix
text: Interested? No. He's lurking, on the prowl for information that will serve him well in the future.

name: snowman
text: Naw, he's just giving him shit.

name: em2
text: This is his duty.

name: hbaranov
text: Lyle is, as ever, collecting blackmail information, which he can use for favours after 'the lights go out'.

name: babeeazz
text: in archie world everything is defined by the length, color, and style of one's follicles.  where else is the defining factor between one superhot chick being popular and sought-after and another superhot chick being a tomboy bumpkin is the color of their hair.  EVEN THOUGH THEY LOOK EXACTLY THE SAME!!!

name: awksedperl
text: He looks nothing like me.  (My first name might be Archie)

name: greenkoolayd
text: apparently, archie has proposed to veronica in a recent issue of the comic.  some archie comics nerd sold his original #1 because hes so pissed about archies choice.

name: epicurus
text: Seriously though VERONICA?

name: greenkoolayd
text: he should have just kept the money he spent on the ring and kept pegging them both, like he has been for the past however-many years.

name: epicurus
text:
This comic could actually be reduced to just the last panel. Actually that would make a good perplexing tattoo.

Or Epitaph

name: angusword
text: i think this is the very first REAL achewood comic. it defines teodor as who he is.
